verses.verse: <S%H3588>When<s%> you <S%H3318>go<s%> out to <S%H4421>battle<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> your <S%H341>enemies,<s%> and <S%H7200>see<s%> <S%H5483>horses,<s%> and <S%H7393>chariots,<s%> and a <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H7227>more<s%> than you, be not <S%H3372>afraid<s%> of them: for the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> is with you, <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H5927>brought<s%> you up out of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt.<s%>

And it shall be, when you are <S%H7126>come<s%> <S%H7126>near<s%> to the <S%H4421>battle,<s%> that the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H5066>approach<s%> and <S%H1696>speak<s%> to the <S%H5971>people,<s%>

And shall <S%H559>say<s%> to them, <S%H8085>Hear,<s%> O <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> you <S%H7126>approach<s%> this <S%H3117>day<s%> to <S%H4421>battle<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> your <S%H341>enemies:<s%> let not your <S%H3824>hearts<s%> <S%H7401>faint,<s%> <S%H3372>fear<s%> not, and do not <S%H2648>tremble,<s%> <S%H408>neither<s%> be you <S%H6206>terrified<s%> <S%H6440>because<s%> of them;
For the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> is he that <S%H1980>goes<s%> with you, to <S%H3898>fight<s%> for you <S%H5973>against<s%> your <S%H341>enemies,<s%> to <S%H3467>save<s%> you.

And the <S%H7860>officers<s%> shall <S%H1696>speak<s%> to the <S%H5971>people,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H4310>What<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> is there that has <S%H1129>built<s%> a <S%H2319>new<s%> <S%H1004>house,<s%> and has not <S%H2596>dedicated<s%> it? let him <S%H3212>go<s%> and <S%H7725>return<s%> to his <S%H1004>house,<s%> <S%H6435>lest<s%> he <S%H4191>die<s%> in the <S%H4421>battle,<s%> and <S%H312>another<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H2596>dedicate<s%> it.

And <S%H4310>what<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> is he that has <S%H5193>planted<s%> a <S%H3754>vineyard,<s%> and has not yet <S%H2490>eaten<s%> of it? let him also <S%H3212>go<s%> and <S%H7725>return<s%> to his <S%H1004>house,<s%> <S%H6435>lest<s%> he <S%H4191>die<s%> in the <S%H4421>battle,<s%> and <S%H312>another<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H2490>eat<s%> of it.

And <S%H4310>what<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> is there that has <S%H781>betrothed<s%> a <S%H802>wife,<s%> and has not <S%H3947>taken<s%> her? let him <S%H3212>go<s%> and <S%H7725>return<s%> to his <S%H1004>house,<s%> <S%H6435>lest<s%> he <S%H4191>die<s%> in the <S%H4421>battle,<s%> and <S%H312>another<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H3947>take<s%> her.

And the <S%H7860>officers<s%> shall <S%H1696>speak<s%> <S%H3254>further<s%> to the <S%H5971>people,<s%> and they shall <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H4310>What<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> is there that is <S%H3373>fearful<s%> and <S%H7390>fainthearted?<s%> let him <S%H3212>go<s%> and <S%H7725>return<s%> to his <S%H1004>house,<s%> <S%H6435>lest<s%> his <S%H251>brethren's<s%> <S%H3824>heart<s%> <S%H4549>faint<s%> as well as his <S%H3824>heart.<s%>

And it shall be, when the <S%H7860>officers<s%> have made an <S%H3615>end<s%> of <S%H1696>speaking<s%> to the people <S%H5971><s%>that they shall make <S%H8269>captains<s%> of the <S%H6635>armies<s%> to <S%H7218>lead<s%> the <S%H5971>people.<s%>
<S%H3588>When<s%> you <S%H7126>come<s%> <S%H7126>near<s%> to a <S%H5892>city<s%> to <S%H3898>fight<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> it, then <S%H7121>proclaim<s%> <S%H7965>peace<s%> to it.

And it shall be, <S%H518>if<s%> it make you <S%H6030>answer<s%> of <S%H7965>peace,<s%> and <S%H6605>open<s%> to you, then it shall be, that <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> that is <S%H4672>found<s%> therein shall be <S%H4522>tributaries<s%> to you, and they shall <S%H5647>serve<s%> you.
And <S%H518>if<s%> it will make <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H7999>peace<s%> with you, but will make <S%H4421>war<s%> <S%H5973>against<s%> you, then you shall <S%H6696>besiege<s%> it:

And when the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> has <S%H5414>delivered<s%> it into your <S%H3027>hands,<s%> you shall <S%H5221>smite<s%> <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H2138>male<s%> thereof with the <S%H6310>edge<s%> of the <S%H2719>sword:<s%>

But the <S%H802>women,<s%> and the <S%H2945>little<s%> ones, and the <S%H929>cattle,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> that is in the <S%H5892>city,<s%> even <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H7998>spoil<s%> thereof, shall you <S%H962>take<s%> to yourself; and you shall <S%H398>eat<s%> the <S%H7998>spoil<s%> of your <S%H341>enemies,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> has <S%H5414>given<s%> you.

<S%H3651>Thus<s%> shall you <S%H6213>do<s%> to <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5892>cities<s%> which are <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H7350>far<s%> off from you, <S%H834>which<s%> are not of the <S%H5892>cities<s%> of <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H2007><s%> <S%H1471>nations.<s%>

But of the <S%H5892>cities<s%> of <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H5971>people,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> does <S%H5414>give<s%> you for an <S%H5159>inheritance,<s%> you shall <S%H2421>save<s%> <S%H2421>alive<s%> <S%H3808>nothing<s%> <S%H3605><s%> that <S%H5397>breathes:<s%>

But you shall utterly <S%H2763>destroy<s%> them; namely, the <S%H2850>Hittites,<s%> and the <S%H567>Amorites,<s%> the <S%H3669>Canaanites,<s%> and the <S%H6522>Perizzites,<s%> the <S%H2340>Hivites,<s%> and the <S%H2983>Jebusites;<s%> as the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> has <S%H6680>commanded<s%> you:

That they <S%H3925>teach<s%> you not to <S%H6213>do<s%> after <S%H3605>all<s%> their <S%H8441>abominations,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> they have done to their <S%H430>gods;<s%> so should you <S%H2398>sin<s%> against the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God.<s%>

<S%H3588>When<s%> you shall <S%H6696>besiege<s%> a <S%H5892>city<s%> a <S%H7227>long<s%> <S%H3117>time,<s%> in making <S%H3898>war<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> it to <S%H8610>take<s%> it, you shall not <S%H7843>destroy<s%> the <S%H6086>trees<s%> thereof by <S%H5080>forcing<s%> an <S%H1631>ax<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> them: for you may <S%H398>eat<s%> of them, and you shall not <S%H3772>cut<s%> them down (for the <S%H6086>tree<s%> of the <S%H7704>field<s%> is <S%H120>man's<s%> life) to <S%H935>employ<s%> <S%H6440><s%> them in the <S%H4692>siege:<s%>

<S%H7535>Only<s%> the <S%H6086>trees<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> you <S%H3045>know<s%> that they be not <S%H6086>trees<s%> for <S%H3978>meat,<s%> you shall <S%H7843>destroy<s%> and <S%H3772>cut<s%> them down; and you shall <S%H1129>build<s%> <S%H4692>bulwarks<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> the <S%H5892>city<s%> that <S%H6213>makes<s%> <S%H4421>war<s%> with you, <S%H5704>until<s%> it be <S%H3381>subdued.<s%>
